## Load Libraries
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```



## Load Data
```{r}
remove(list = ls())

mass <- read.csv("~/Horsenettle/data/leaf_mass.csv", header = TRUE)

```


## Calculating mean mass
```{r}
(mass.p <- ggplot(mass, aes(x = reorder(population, mass_T), y = mass_T, fill = location)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Popultation", y = "Mass", title = "Leaf mass by population") +
  theme(panel.background = element_blank()))
                   
mass.m <- aov(mass_T ~ ID, data = mass)
summary(mass.m)

```
